item.title: I need help with checkip command! BASE [PI]
item.dc:creator: @i_fail_serv i fail serv
item.description:
@i_fail_serv wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:382629”] if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkip")) { try { String CheckIP = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(CheckIP)) { c.sendMessage("IP:"+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Something like this you mean?[/quote]

yes! thanks !

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with checkip command! BASE [PI]

item.title: I need help with checkip command! BASE [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkip")) {
				try {	
					String CheckIP = playerCommand.substring(8);
					for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
							if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(CheckIP)) {
								c.sendMessage("IP:"+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
								break;
							} 
						}
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
				}	
			}

Something like this you mean?

Read full topic
